string-array.item: Stump says geese are no longer wanted in the U.S

string-array.name: sub_headings
string-array.item: Shows a dialog where blurring is clipped to the ChildView Alpha channel.
Checkout some other fun project on my GitHub Page.
Come say hi to the dev over at http://danielzeller.no

string-array.item: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Stump says geese are no longer wanted in the U.S

resources.string: By Daniel Zeller on Oct 122, 2018, 6:00am EDT
Hi, I\'m a dialog. The BlurBehindLayout has set useChildAlphaAsMask=true so that the blurring is clipped to the alpha of the first child within the layout.
